titles.title: Generate Retirement Ownership Through Long-Term Holding Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals to defer recognition of reinvested capital gains distributions from regulated investment companies.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/20/2007--Introduced. Generate Retirement Ownership Through Long-Term Holding Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that no gain shall be recognized on the receipt of a capital gain dividend distributed by a regulated investment company if such dividend is automatically reinvested in additional shares of the company pursuant to a dividend reinvestment plan.
